thread.title: Amber Rose, Wiz Khalifa: Back on? Ex couple share kiss while out together
thread.title_full: Amber Rose, Wiz Khalifa: Back on? Ex couple share kiss while out together

author: Vwovwe Egbo
title: Amber Rose, Wiz Khalifa: Back on? Ex couple share kiss while out together
text: Wiz Khalifa and Amber Rose get cozy at pre-Grammy gala (instagram) It would come as no surprise for the pair to be reunited less than a year after their divorce was finalized . Rose has always referred to Khalifa as the love of her life, and considering the fact that she once confessed to missing what she shared with the baby daddy, we can't wait for a confirmation. Of course, they would also make their fans very happy too! Tweet Author
